settings.heading: Shop Online Diamond Jewellery with Ease at Panim Creation

settings.text:
A diamond is nature's greatest miracle. It is a precious stone that has withstood the test of time and now, it outshines everything else in the world. Trends have come and gone, but diamond has remained the perennial symbol of beauty, love and commitment. If you are looking for the choicest of diamond jewellery, this is just where you are supposed to be.  Explore a versatile variety of diamond jewellery that fits your style and occasion from the comfort of your home.     

Diamonds are regarded as the eternally glistening symbols of purity and light. At Panim, we source the finest of these diamonds from around the world and carve them into intricate pieces of jewellery. Whether you are looking for one as a token of love or an expression of your unique personality, Panim Creations has the perfect piece for each one. 

Here, you can find diamond jewellery designs suited for every occasion, or even for casual everyday wearing. You can browse through our exclusive diamond necklaces, diamond rings, and diamond earrings. Not only that, you can also choose from a variety of diamond shapes and cuts such as Old European cut diamonds, Old cut diamonds, Rose cut diamonds, Briolette Diamonds, and much more. We invite you to experience this shimmering world of incandescent jewels. The treasure trove of Panim’s sublime diamond jewellery now lies at your fingertips.    

Elevate Your Look with Diamond Jewellery Suitable for Any Event

Diamonds, as everyone knows, are a girl’s best friend. Nothing else elevates her inherent beauty, as does diamond jewellery. Now you can choose from the finest diamonds embedded in rings, bracelets,
necklaces, pendants, and more. Your search for the perfect diamond jewellery ends here. 

Rings

For centuries, diamond rings have been emblems of timeless love and commitment. For a grand expression of love, Panim’s diamond diamond rings are perfect. We also offer a selection of wedding bands, cocktail rings, and eternity bands. Furthermore, we also have an exclusive collection of Diamond Rings for women made of sapphires, emeralds, rubies, and other precious stones.  

Earrings

Diamond earrings light up your appearance and captivate everyone's attention. Panim brings to you a broad selection of stunning diamond earrings in the form of studs, hoops, huggies, drops, dangles, tassel earrings, and many more styles. These diamond earrings for women come in classic designs as well as modern chic styles.

Bracelet

The delicate beauty that diamond bracelets bring to the wrists is unlike any piece of accessory.  Browse through our collection of handcrafted bracelets, featuring diamonds and gemstones of superior quality. These diamond bracelets for women consist of the most gorgeous diamond cuts- be it rose, briolette, and many other classic cuts.

Pendants

The pendant is the crowning glory of necklaces. It is the one that gives the necklace its unique statement and, hence, holds a lot of power. Panim offers a treasure trove of stunning diamond pendants for women. Apart from elegant pave diamond bangles and rose-cut tennis bracelets, you can also pick from bracelets engraved with sapphire, emerald, and ruby jewellery.   

Necklaces

Diamond necklaces embellish your neckline and make you feel like a queen. Experience regality with Panim’s breathtaking diamond necklaces. These are hand-carved by stones, in a way that elevates the brilliance of the diamonds. The arrangement of the diamond beads and gems in these necklaces makes them truly desirable.

Panim Creation - Diamond Cut Designs 

A diamond’s uniqueness lies in its cuts. These cut designs determine how it scatters light and thus its appearance. Panim Creation offers a wide range of flawless diamond cut designs, creating jewellery  that go beyond the ordinary. 

Briolette Diamond

A briolette diamond is known as a teardrop-shaped gem. It has got facets all around, resulting in a brilliant sparkle. You will often find it in elegant jewellery pieces like necklaces, bracelets, and earrings. It is one of the most sought-after choices for creating a distinctive and glamorous look in jewellery.

Diamond Beads

Diamond beads are minuscule, spherical stones carved out from tiny diamonds. When strung together, they create splendid necklaces and bracelets. Diamond beads come in various sizes and colours. Being so versatile, they are used in both modern and traditional diamond jewellery designs.

Diamond Rose-cut

The diamond rose cut is a vintage-inspired cut, which resembles a rose petal. It has a characteristic flat base and a dome-shaped crown. This nature-inspired cut provides a softer, more sombre sparkle. You will find these diamonds mostly in antique-style jewellery, offering a soft romantic aesthetic.  

Old European Cut Diamond

Thevold European cut diamond is a vintage diamond cut that became popular in the early 20th century. It features a small table, a high crown, and larger facets. Its unique anatomy gives it a pronounced sparkle. These diamonds are a prized choice for vintage-style jewellery.

History of Panim Creation

Panim Creations holds a glorious legacy spanning over four illustrious decades. Situated in the bustling commercial hubs of Mumbai and Hong Kong, this family-run enterprise has a historical association with fine diamonds and precious gemstones.

Driven by the aspiration of experimenting with unique diamond designs and shapes, Panim Creations embarked on the path of working with diamond elements such as diamond beads, diamond briolettes, nizam cut or taviz cut diamonds, diamond portraits, and rose cuts, while maintaining a sincere commitment towards to ethically sourcing rough-cut diamonds from the world's most esteemed mines.  

With this ambition in mind, Mr Madhavji Dholiya laid the foundation for Panim Creations in the city of Mumbai, formerly known as Bombay. In a matter of a few years, Panim’s earnestly crafted diamond jewellery captivated global markets. In the 2000s, new-age jewellery creators Nikunj Dholiya & Parth Dholiya assumed the role of creative directors of Panim Creations. Subsequently, the company decided to introduce old European diamond shapes into its cherished collection. That brought in the highly intricate designs of Georgian, Victorian, Edwardian, Art Nouveau, Art Deco, and Retro eras in Panim’s
catalogue. This visionary step catapulted Panim's popularity amongst jewellery enthusiasts and collectors of the world. Today, Panim Creations continues to bring you the freshest and most extraordinary jewellery using the finest quality diamonds and gems.

Why You Should Buy Diamond Jewellery from Panim Creation

Home to the finest diamond jewellery, Panim Creation is strongly committed to quality and precision. From rings, earrings, bracelets, and pendants, to necklaces for women, a diverse jewellery line awaits you. Dive right into our extensive collection with our hasslefree online shopping experience. To help you make the best purchase, we offer you illustrative size charts, product information and high-resolution images. Long story short: If you seek diamond perfection, head right to our collection. This is your one and only destination of limitless and trusted diamond jewellery choices.  

FAQs on Diamond Jewellery 

What is the difference between Tassel & waterfall design?

Both these designs in diamond jewellery differ in the arrangement of diamonds. Tassel designs have a linear arrangement with smaller diamonds at the top. Altogether it creates a cascading effect that looks like a tassel. Waterfall designs, on the other hand, involve a tiered pattern with diamonds layered in a step fashion.  

What are the different types of diamond cuts available for jewellery?

In jewellery, there are numerous types of diamond cuts used. Each one offers a unique shine and shape to the diamond. The classic round brilliant cut offers a distinctive sparkle. For those who appreciate the old-world charm, options like the old European cut and the rose cut, will please them. Additionally, the oval, pear, heart, and briolette cuts are impressive as well.

How do I determine the quality and value of a diamond in a piece of jewellery?

To determine the value and quality of a diamond in jewellery, always keep in mind the "Four Cs"- Carat weight, cut (how well it reflects light), colour (graded on a scale from D for colourless to Z for light yellow), and clarity (absence of internal flaws). However, for a more precise assessment, it is recommended to consult gemologists or other professionals.  

Can I customise a piece of diamond jewellery with a specific diamond or
design?    

The one-word answer to this is- Yes. You can get your diamond jewellery customised at Panim Creations. Set your imagination free, we will bring it to reality for you. We excel at creating uniquely gorgeous diamond necklaces, rings, earrings, and many more.

How should I care for and clean my diamond jewellery to maintain its sparkle?

Diamond is forever, and so is its shine when kept clean. To clean your diamond jewellery, you can use a soft cloth dipped in mild soapy water. While storing your pieces, make sure to keep them separately to prevent them from being scratched. It is advisable to go for professional cleaning and inspection annually.   

How can I determine my ring size or the appropriate size for a diamond necklace or bracelet?

To determine your ring size precisely, consult a ring sizing chart available at your nearest jewellery shop. For necklaces and bracelets, measure your neck or wrist with a measuring tape to get an accurate size.
